Sentencas: In order to study the effects of operating parameters on the performance of the hybrid engine, thermodynamic performance models are built.

Sentencas: The main conclusions are as follows: (1) The specific thrust and specific impulse of the engine are dramatically increased with increasing bypass ratios.
Titulo: Performance assessment of a solid oxide fuel cell turbine-less jet hybrid engine integrated with a fan and afterburners

Sentencas: Meanwhile, fuel cell power rises slowly, which indicates that the engine with fans has more advantages than the one without fans in the respect of thrust-weight ratios.
Titulo: Performance assessment of a solid oxide fuel cell turbine-less jet hybrid engine integrated with a fan and afterburners

Sentencas: (2) Fuel cell power first increases then decreases with increasing fan pressure ratio under the conditions of constant overall pressure ratios.
Titulo: Performance assessment of a solid oxide fuel cell turbine-less jet hybrid engine integrated with a fan and afterburners

Sentencas: (3) Increasing afterburner temperature is the most effective way to improve the thrust of the engine.
Titulo: Performance assessment of a solid oxide fuel cell turbine-less jet hybrid engine integrated with a fan and afterburners

Sentencas: When the temperature is 2217K, the specific thrust is up to 3085 N/(kg.s(-1)).
Titulo: Performance assessment of a solid oxide fuel cell turbine-less jet hybrid engine integrated with a fan and afterburners

Sentencas: Meanwhile, the specific impulse and thermal efficiency are 2693 s and 60.5%, respectively.
